object.name: editChatInviteLink
object.description: Use this method to edit a non-primary invite link created by the bot. The bot must be an administrator in the chat for this to work and must have the appropriate administrator rights. Returns the edited invite link as a ChatInviteLink object.
object.html_description: Use this method to edit a non-primary invite link created by the bot. The bot must be an administrator in the chat for this to work and must have the appropriate administrator rights. Returns the edited invite link as a ChatInviteLink object.
object.rst_description: Use this method to edit a non-primary invite link created by the bot. The bot must be an administrator in the chat for this to work and must have the appropriate administrator rights. Returns the edited invite link as a :class:`aiogram.types.chat_invite_link.ChatInviteLink` object.

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format :code:`@channelusername`)
annotations.name: chat_id

annotations.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the link will expire
annotations.html_description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the link will expire
annotations.rst_description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the link will expire
annotations.name: expire_date

annotations.description: The maximum number of users that can be members of the chat simultaneously after joining the chat via this invite link; 1-99999
annotations.html_description: The maximum number of users that can be members of the chat simultaneously after joining the chat via this invite link; 1-99999
annotations.rst_description: The maximum number of users that can be members of the chat simultaneously after joining the chat via this invite link; 1-99999
annotations.name: member_limit

annotations.description: True, if users joining the chat via the link need to be approved by chat administrators. If True, member_limit can't be specified
annotations.html_description: True, if users joining the chat via the link need to be approved by chat administrators. If True, member_limit can't be specified
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if users joining the chat via the link need to be approved by chat administrators. If :code:`True`, *member_limit* can't be specified
annotations.name: creates_join_request
